name: 6th International Conference on Wound Care, Tissue Repair and Regenerative Medicine
content: Back again to make a difference! 6th Series of Wound Care 2022 beginning on December 05-06, 2022 in Dubai, UAE with the theme “Expanding Horizons – New Approaches and Innovation to Wound Care, Tissue Repair and Regenerative Medicine” Wound Care 2022 would offer a great opportunity for wound care nursing, tissue repair, tissue science community to depict their research work. Taking part in the international conference will be a wonderful chance to meet eminent personalities in the field of Wound care, nursing and tissue repair specialist and know more about the advancements in the field. We encourage you to stay connected during Wound Care 2022, keep us proactive and support us to shape the future of Wound Care, Tissue Repair and Regenerative Medicine. Contact: Ms. Lizeth Andrea Program Director | Wound Care 2019 Email: woundcare@nursingcongress.net Phone: +44 203 769 1755 WhatsApp: +44 7537171588
